name: SPY-der PIG
description:
This is Obstacle course game. Agent Spy-der Pig with the mission of finding and destroying the most powerful thing in the dark world. The higher you go, there will be more obstacles and challenges from Will-o'-the-wisp, black cats, poisonous spiders to ghostly witches' fire pans...

Along the way, don't forget to collect gold coins to upgrade cases and guns, these are two powerful tools for you. This lonely adventure to reach The Top will demand full mastery of the technique of jumping, shooting, swing... Let's fight together with Mr.derPig to see who will get to the best position in this journey.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - GAME FEATURES - ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


  • Diverse gameplay strategies
    You can shoot rope guns, swing, jump on terrain, jump in the air, dodge traps, collect coins, kill ghosts and more.
  • Support tools
    Cases and guns for spies to upgrade that improve the ability to jump and kill enemies.
  • Cute art style
    Many characters built-in with cute blocky style, snappy animations. From the spy Spyder Pig, to the scenes, to the enemies, you will definitely enjoy the adorable characters and background designs. Don't miss the sound in the game, it will make you laugh out loud.
  • Challenge and perseverance
    fun entertaining game, helping you and your friends increase perseverance, especially when playing together. Challenge your friends to play this game to see who gets the higher score!

    This Game is appropriate for all ages.
